name: Sig-of-Sig Vault (2-of-2)
description: An unusual example of a template which must be signed in a specific order: Second Signer may only sign after First Signer.

lock.name: Sig-of-Sig Vault
lock.script: OP_2 OP_PICK <second.public_key> OP_CHECKDATASIGVERIFY OP_DUP OP_HASH160 <$(<first.public_key> OP_HASH160)> OP_EQUALVERIFY OP_CHECKSIG
